file_content.text: As if it wasn't enough to sense your presence, you seem to have a need to do everything as loudly as possible.
This is the Jedi Temple. You are not welcome. Leave this sacred place--now. You'll not get a second warning.
You're a fool to think you can threaten the Emperor's Wrath. Your power is insignificant next to mine.
This facility now belongs to me; you're little more than a tresspasser.
Soon as the Empire secures this place, I'm gonna tell them to burn it to the ground. I've got that kind of pull.
Why so tentative? Could it be a master Jedi--in his own house, no less--is afraid of a fight?
This doesn't have to end in bloodshed. Surrender peacefully, Jedi.
You've had your chance to retreat. Now you'll learn why I'm the High Council's chief combat advisor.
That's the problem with you Jedi: I don't even give a first warning.
